oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Canonical Citation Community Profile
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: David Ruddy, Cornell University Library
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Canonical Citation Community Profile, built around the Key/Encoded-Value ContextObject Format, depends on the Key/Encoded-Value Metadata Format for Canonical Citations that meet the needs of citing a work or a passage within a work that is independent of edition or translation.
